content.question: In the context of the passage as a whole, the seventh and eighth paragraphs (“During the first phase . . . Edna Lewis”) serve primarily to

choices.label: present details of the author’s personal experience in culinary school that support her main argument
emphasize a contrast between the author and many of her fellow culinary school students
offer an example of sustained pressure on an established institution resulting in significant change
describe the ways in which specific dishes prepared by Edna Lewis have influenced the author’s cooking

content.answer: present details of the author’s personal experience in culinary school that support her main argument

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
